amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds to Sunsets Land and Water Conservation Fund grants with states or local government units after 20 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 46 printed in House Report 114-683 to sunset Land and Water Conservation Fund grants with states or local government units after 20 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brat amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brat amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Brat.
